solution_line_template: If 20% of {total_customers} customers ordered vanilla, then there were {vanilla_ordered_decimal}*{total_customers}=<<{vanilla_ordered_decimal}*{total_customers}={vanilla_customers}>>{vanilla_customers} customers who ordered vanilla.

If there were twice as many people who ordered vanilla as chocolate, then {vanilla_customers}/{vanilla_to_chocolate_factor}=<<{vanilla_customers}/{vanilla_to_chocolate_factor}={chocolate_customers}>>{chocolate_customers} customers ordered chocolate.
